name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.job.running.map.limit
description:
The maximum number of simultaneous map tasks per job.
  There is no limit if this value is 0 or negative.

name: fs.du.interval
description: File space usage statistics refresh interval in msec.

name: mapreduce.input.fileinputformat.split.minsize
description:
The minimum size chunk that map input should be split
  into.  Note that some file formats may have minimum split sizes that
  take priority over this setting.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.datanode.cache.refresh.interval.ms
description:
How often to refresh the datanode storages cache in milliseconds. This cache
    keeps live datanode storage reports fetched from namenode. After elapsed time,
    it will again fetch latest datanodes from namenode.
    By default, this parameter is set to 5 minutes.

name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

name: dfs.content-summary.limit
description:
The maximum content summary counts allowed in one locking period. 0 or a negative number
    means no limit (i.e. no yielding).
